patthana9.6:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana9.6:0.3_0: That is, those who are skilled in the heaven of the skillful.
patthana9.6:1.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful.
patthana9.6:1.1_2: No matter what is the cause or condition for the unskillful.
patthana9.6:1.1_3: The basis for the topic of the aggregates.
patthana9.6:1.1_4: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful and not its cause or reason.
patthana9.6:10.1_0: Not have no declared cause or condition for the reason.’
patthana9.6:11.1_0: Not for the sake of a cause or condition that gives rise to battles, and because of overestimation. No for the sake of decoration, they don’t give rise to unsullied.
patthana9.6:12.1_0: The cause, based on what is the reason for these three things. ...
patthana9.6:13.1_0: (All should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
patthana9.6:2.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the unskillful.
patthana9.6:3.1_0: No cause or reason for the sake of doing unskillful and unskillful qualities of the unskillful. And for the sake of cause, causes and reason why the reason for the sake of cause, cause and reason for the reason.
patthana9.6:4.1_0: For the sake of investigating, based on the six interior sense fields ...
patthana9.6:5.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the unskillful.
patthana9.6:6.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the unskillful.
patthana9.6:7.1_0: No cause or reason for the sake of declaring, nor skilled in, and skilled in means.
patthana9.6:9.1_0: Not have no declared cause or condition for the reason.’
